analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0x3003dc69d03227ccaace3142452a514a04a37d7f.sol:
	Contract WinnerToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0x3003dc69d03227ccaace3142452a514a04a37d7f.sol#222)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0x3003dc69d03227ccaace3142452a514a04a37d7f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/25/0x3003dc69d03227ccaace3142452a514a04a37d7f.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/25/0x3003dc69d03227ccaace3142452a514a04a37d7f.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of WinnerToken.burn (/unique_chucks/25/0x3003dc69d03227ccaace3142452a514a04a37d7f.sol#206) is not in mixedCase
